wikipedia_page.main: Will Starr (27 April 1922 – 6 March 1976) was a Scottish solo accordionist.

response: * Scotland: Peter Wyper, Jimmy Shand, Will Starr, Fergie MacDonald

* Will Starr (1922–1976) – Scottish accordionist, technically a genius and a true master of the button key accordion, famous for his expertise at playing every genre of music.  Described as the true "Master of the Button Key Accordion"
Other people of note with links to the village include Scottish folk singer and accordion player Will Starr. and former WBO Flyweight world champion boxer Pat Clinton.

Foster was taught to play the accordion by a Sr Anges Murray, a nun of the Mercy Order in Ballymahon and Frankie Gavigan. Other influences on his playing included Jimmy Shand and Will Starr. He has recorded a tribute to the latter, entitled The Old Button Box, and has claimed that his accordion would probably be the last thing he would be prepared to give up.

David has also been involved in transcribing and restoring rare archive recordings of many of the major Scottish musicians for commercial release by international record labels. These include performances by Sir Jimmy Shand; Will Starr; Bobby McLeod; and Jim Cameron.
